H3.text: what currency does the czech republic use now. Czech koruna

A4.text: The koruna, or crown, has been the currency of the Czech Republic since 1993.

A5.text: Although the country is economically well positioned to adopt the euro, there is considerable opposition to the move within the Czech Republic.
